price: 10. Waxaan ku idhi: Ka barya denbi dhaaf Rabbigiin; waa Denbi Dhaaf Badane’e.
arabic: فَقُلۡتُ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: faqul'tu is'taghfirū rabbakum innahu kāna ghaffāran
